item.title: Deborah add a quote by Ian McEwan
item.description: "It was always the view of my parents...that hot weather encouraged loose morals among young people." -- Ian McEwan

item.title: Deborah add a quote by Anjuelle Floyd
item.description: "It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding. - Erma Bombeck" -- Anjuelle Floyd

item.title: Deborah add a quote by Erick S. Gray
item.description: "Whatever you give a woman, she will make greater. If you give her sperm, she'll give you a baby.. If you give her a house, she'll give you a home. If you give her groceries, she'll give you a meal. If you give her a smile, she'll give you her heart. She multiplies and enlarges what is given to her. So, if you give her any crap, be ready to receive a ton of shit!" -- Erick S. Gray

item.title: Deborah add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
